This file is used to 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
SOURCES = c("BEEPS", "BTI", "CDG", "CPIA", "DB", "ES", "FAD_FR", "FH", "FSI", "GCI", "GFS", "Global_Indicators", "Global_Integrity", "HRM", "IBP", "IIAG", "ILO", "IPD", "IPU", "PAM", "PAM_IAD", "PAY_EMP", "PEFA", "PFI", "PIM", "PIV", "QOG", "SC", "SGI","TI", "WBL", "WGI", "WJP")
```

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
